Interface MolecularDynamicsProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
MulticoreMolecularDynamicsProvider
public interface MolecularDynamicsProvider
Interface for Molecular Dynamics (MD) providers.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Method Details

    • integrate

      void integrate(Real[] positions, Real[] velocities, Real[] forces, Real[] masses, Real dt, Real damping)
      Integrates the equations of motion (e.g., using Velocity Verlet).
      Parameters:
      positions - Flat array of positions [x0, y0, z0, x1, y1, z1, ...]
      velocities - Flat array of velocities [vx0, vy0, vz0, ...]
      forces - Flat array of forces [fx0, fy0, fz0, ...]
      masses - Array of masses (one per atom)
      dt - Time step
      damping - Damping factor

    • calculateBondForces

      void calculateBondForces(Real[] positions, Real[] forces, int[] bondIndices, Real[] bondLengths, Real[] bondConstants)
      Calculates bond forces (Hooke's Law).
      Parameters:
      positions - Flat array of positions
      forces - Flat array of forces (accumulated)
      bondIndices - Flat array of bond pairs [a1_0, a2_0, a1_1, a2_1, ...]
      bondLengths - Equilibrium lengths for each bond
      bondConstants - Spring constants for each bond

    • calculateNonBondedForces

      void calculateNonBondedForces(Real[] positions, Real[] forces, Real epsilon, Real sigma, Real cutoff)
      Calculates non-bonded forces (Lennard-Jones).
      Parameters:
      positions - Flat array of positions
      forces - Flat array of forces (accumulated)
      epsilon - Depth of potential well
      sigma - Finite distance at which inter-particle potential is zero
      cutoff - Cutoff distance

    • integrate

      void integrate(double[] positions, double[] velocities, double[] forces, double[] masses, double dt, double damping)
      Integrates using double primitives.

    • calculateBondForces

      void calculateBondForces(double[] positions, double[] forces, int[] bondIndices, double[] bondLengths, double[] bondConstants)
      Calculates bond forces using double primitives.

    • calculateNonBondedForces

      void calculateNonBondedForces(double[] positions, double[] forces, double epsilon, double sigma, double cutoff)
      Calculates non-bonded forces using double primitives.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns the name of this provider.
      Returns:
      provider name
